text: Yuji Iwasawa (岩沢雄司; born 4 June 1954) is a Japanese jurist. He has been a member of the International Court of Justice since 22 June 2018. He formerly chaired the United Nations Human Rights Committee. ==References== Category:1954 births Category:Living people Category:Japanese jurists Category:University of Tokyo alumni Category:Harvard Law School alumni Category:University of Virginia School of Law alumni Category:International Court of Justice judges
title: Yuji Iwasawa
